PullRequestIsStale.Value: Reminder: Hi reviewer @<{0}>, and @<[PRBotProject]\PRBotProject Team> - This pull request needs your attention for review.
Description: The message that is written by BroomBot as a comment on a stale pull request.
Use @<{0}> to tag the creator of the pull request.

PullRequestIsAbandoned.Value: @<{0}> - This pull request is being abandoned due to inactivity.
Description: The message that is written by BroomBot as a comment on a stale pull request when it is being abandoned.
Use @<{0}> to tag the creator of the pull request.
The Author.Id/UPN property of the service account running BroomBot.
A prefix on the tags BroomBot applies to stale pull requests.
The tag has the format 'WarningPrefix: (UTC) DateTimeStamp' so maintainers and administrators may keep track of BroomBot's warnings.
The number of hours a pull request can go without any activity before the pull request is considered stale.
How many warnings are given to a pull request creator before the pull request is abandoned.
During a sweep for stale pull requests, if there have been WarningCount number of warnings since
there has been any activity on a pull request, the pull request will be abandoned. So, pull requests
are marked as abandoned by BroomBot on the WarningCount+1 sweep.
